publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2667 Mr Andy Kerr: Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
